body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park          Photos & Multimedia Photo galleries, social media channels and the Jackson Ward podcast tour. History & Culture Learn about Maggie L. Walker's life and her historical significance.  Education Plan a field trip to the site or reserve a traveling trunk! Kids & Youth Learn about kids' activities like the Summer Youth Leadership Institute, being a junior ranger, and more! Management Park management information including laws and policies. Bookstore Books and other collectibles relating to Maggie L. Walker.
title: Maggie L Walker National Historic Site: Learn About the Park
